titles.title: A resolution honoring Lady Bird Johnson for her years of dedicated service to the people of the United States and her efforts in the beautification of the Nation and congratulating her in her diamond jubilee year.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/20/1988--Introduced. Honors Lady Bird Johnson for her service to the people of the United States, recognizes her leadership in the beautification of our Nation, and congratulates her in her diamond jubilee year.
